DocAttribute.Name: PanelDepth
DocAttribute.Documentation: Depth of the door panel, measured perpendicular to the plane of the door leaf.

DocAttribute.Name: PanelOperation
DocAttribute.Documentation: The PanelOperation defines the way of operation of that panel. The PanelOperation of the door panel has to correspond with the OperationType of the IfcDoorStyle.

DocAttribute.Name: PanelWidth
DocAttribute.Documentation: Width of this panel, given as ratio relative to the total clear opening width of the door.

DocAttribute.Name: PanelPosition
DocAttribute.Documentation: Position of this panel within the door.

DocAttribute.Name: ShapeAspectStyle
DocAttribute.Documentation: Pointer to the shape aspect, if given. The shape aspect reflects the part of the door shape, which represents the door panel.

DocWhereRule.Name: WR31
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The _IfcDoorPanelProperties_ shall only be used in the context of an _IfcDoorStyle_.
